title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.J.Res. 43 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
April 13, 2017
On Thursday, April 13, 2017, the President signed into law:H.J.Res. 43, which nullifies the Department of Health and Human Services rule prohibiting recipients of Title X grants for the provision of family planning services from excluding a subgrantee from participating for reasons other than its ability to provide Title X services.
